title.text: Multilingual Video and Audio News Alerting

entities.text: Multilingual Video and Audio News Alerting

abstractContent.text: This paper describes a fully-automated real-time broadcast news video and audio processing system.

entities.text: real-time broadcast news video and audio processing

abstractContent.text: The system combines speech recognition , machine translation, and cross-lingual information retrieval components to enable real-time alerting from live English and Arabic news sources.

entities.text: alerting from live English and Arabic news sources
